issue.title: [JS] Package sourcemap files, update default package JS version
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4780](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4780). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The build should split the sourcemaps out to speed up client builds, and include a "module" entry in the package.json for @pika/web, and the main package should ship the latest ESNext JS versions.
